creator: dims@yahoo.com
text:
URLConnection is brain dead! long live URLConnection :)

Please accept the enclosed patch for SoapSampler, basically it now extends the
HTTPSampler2 and overrides some of the methods.

thanks,
dims

creator: dims@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 18408
SoapSampler now extends HTTPSampler2

creator: dims@yahoo.com
text:
switched some of the methods/variables in HTTPSampler2 to package local from
private to support their use in SoapSampler.

thanks,
dims
